alert.note: Alert for Ohio; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 8:09PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, CENTRAL SWITZERLAND, EASTERN CARROLL, KENTON, SOUTHERN CAMPBELL, SOUTHERN BOONE, NORTHWESTERN GRANT, NORTHWESTERN PENDLETON AND GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM EST... At 809 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located over Warsaw, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Covington, Florence, Independence, Erlanger, Edgewood, Alexandria, Elsmere, Fort Mitchell, Taylor Mill, Fort Wright, Crescent Springs, Walton, Crestview Hills, Lakeside Park, Oakbrook, Claryville, Burlington, Union, Crittenden and Warsaw. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 58 and 77. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 164 and 187. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
